text: - My name is Roy Omabuwa,

and I am a Senior Leader
for CSMs in the US West.
CSM stand for customer solutions managers.
Customer solutions managers,
they really focus on simplifying

and accelerating cloud
transformation for our customers.

I've been with AWS now
roughly eight months.
I think my biggest surprise
has just been the intense culture here.
Previously, a culture for me was,

we had these words on
walls that we walked by
or in the break room.
Here, it's totally different.

Those words on the wall,
you actually live them.
Being customer-obsessed is not something
that you just see on the wall,
it's something that you actually live
and breathe every day.

And an example of that
would be really focusing
on the customer and their outcomes,

rather than selling a
product or a service.
(bright music)
